name: Rachel West
text: Working with The Rainbow Balloon Company was awesome! We were needing some centerpieces for our Dunkin' Grand Opening at 2419 Acton Road, Vestavia Hills, AL, and what we got was above and beyond what we were expecting. This is our second time using them for a Grand Opening and a second time we were incredibly happy! The team was easy to work with and they went above and beyond to help us!

name: Jonathan Fudge
text:
The Rainbow Balloon Company is our go-to balloon decor company in Birmingham, Alabama and we absolutely LOVE their work. Whether we are trying to book a client for organic garland or for the every growing in popularity yard decor, they are amazing to work with. I highly recommend them.

They even offer YARD CARDS! We are so excited to have found them and been able to work with them. Our staff ran into them at a convention where the owner of The Rainbow Balloon Company was winning first place after first place awards for her balloons. Well deserved! If you found this company, consider yourself lucky and give them a call. You won't find anyone better in the greater Birmingham area.

name: Cliff Jones
text: I was referred to The Rainbow Balloon Company by a friend and used them for my wife's 40th Birthday. Not only did they do a PHENOMENAL JOB, but their customer service was top notch and everything was handled in a very professional manner!  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them for any occasion!  You wont be disappointed!

name: Jessica Lee Ramos
text: Jessica and Mary did an amazing job setting up a birthday display for my twin boys turning 10.  They will work with you to get everything just right with balloon colors to coordinate with the yard signs.  Super friendly!  I will definitely refer them to my friends and plan to use them again. Thank you Rainbow Balloon Company!

name: Arturo Briseno Jr
text: With everyone being stuck at home for COVID (so no classroom birthday parties), we wanted to do something special for our little one's birthday this year.  We ordered a Classic Celebration Marquis from The Rainbow Balloon Company and loved it.  They offer different services but for us the marquis was perfect...  something a little different (and in her favorite colors) to brighten up her day.  Highly recommend checking them out!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! We hope your daughter had a great birthday!!!

name: Julie Bean
text: Fantastic experience working with these fun, talented women! They make the whole process...from planning to delivery/setup....efficient and easy. Their work is beautiful. Highly recommend!

name: Sandra Remington
text: So easy to work with and very responsive! Yard signs and balloons looked wonderful and added such a special cheer to our birthday boy’s day. We will definitely be using them again!

name: Kristin Bundren
text: We love Rainbow Balloon Company! We have ordered from them twice this year (a birthday and New Years) and the balloons were fabulous! The balloon art adds a fun, colorful, and festive touch. Great communication and product! We are looking forward to more in the future!!

name: Olivia Horan
text: If you come to any Diamonds Direct event and see our gorgeous balloon garlands -- these ladies need to get all the credit! Fabulous job every time, and they have a knack for bringing your visions to life :) Highly recommend for any event, big or small!

resp.text: Always a pleasure working with you!!! :D

name: Ashlee Ammons
text:
I found this awesome company after a Google search, I wanted to surprise my Mom with something positive on my Grandmothers 1st birthday following her passing this year.  Although they are known for celebratory occasions they really worked with me to create something with the appropriate tone to make my Mom feel special on an otherwise somber day.  My Mom was deeply touch by this and cried and smiled all weekend long.  The ladies at RBC were wonderful to work with, I accidentally gave them the incorrect address to the house and they communicated with me quickly and got it set and delivered the WOW
as promised!  I would highly recco them, if I need anything further, they will be my 1st call!  Last, they just kinda seem like awesome humans, they were kind, friendly and personable throughout!

name: ShuMarri Jennings
text: They were very professional. They all had great attitudes and the great work ethic. They made sure our event was everything we imagined.

name: Magic City Cheer & Tumble
text: Great company! Easy to work with- gave us exactly what we asked for. Great product.

name: Amanda Austin
text: Very responsive, easy to work with, and did a wonderful job decorating our yard for our daughter's birthday!

name: Deidra K. Diaz
text: I am so thankful I got a Facebook recommendation to use the Rainbow Balloon Company!   Your creativity and decor is SO MUCH better than just having big letters on the lawn.  The custom colors, bright and vivid design and personal touch was exactly what we wanted to celebrate my Mom's 71st Birthday during the Covid-19 pandemic.  I can't say THANK YOU enough, with a special nod to Chandler who was exceptional customer servixe!   Wow...your company is amazing!

name: Ann Katherine Hardeman
text: Excellent service! Amazing balloons!  A pleasure to work with, and so helpful!

name: Steven Hughes
text: This is my next door neighbor.  Nice folks.

name: Brandon Mullins
text: Best balloon designer in the state

text: Working with The Rainbow Balloon Company was awesome! text: Excellent service! Amazing balloons!  A pleasure to work with, and so helpful!

name: Steven Hughes
text: This is my next door neighbor.  Nice folks.

name: Brandon Mullins
text: Best balloon designer in the state

name: Russell Tayler
text: Dealing with Clark has been a great experience his knowledge in the welding supply business has been a truly eye opening experience. I went in there almost with an arrogant attitude thinking that i knew what I wanted. But after listening to me patiently and asking questions, and finding out what I really needed he put me on to the right product. Thanks Clark I cant believe that I have not been using this for my welding applications.

name: Taylor holley
text: Went there an waited at the counter a lady just looked at me but wouldn't help... Horrible service

resp.text: We are sorry that our Customer Service Rep was tied up and unable to speak with you when you came in. Please give us another chance to show you our normally outstanding customer service.

name: Bruce Jones
text: Very good prices with excellent customer service

name: ROY TAYLOR
text: Great place

name: Jason Grant
text: they have anything you need

name: Cason Baker
text: Great place for welding test, tips, and supplies

name: Kenny Tran
text: This Wesco facility has the best faculty and staff ever. They are very nice and helpful. If you are here to purchase welding supplies, I suggest you talk to the sales representative to see what item better suits your needs. They also have a testing facility that will get you AWS certified. I will definitely be purchasing from this location again!

name: 18 Speed
text: unload quick within an hr .

name: Audrey Hyatt
text: Curtious Customer Service. Maybe a little partial to the Male customer, but overall a good experience. Clean store.

name: Dane Reeves
text: Called twice to ask about products and services and was hung up on both times. The first time, after she acknowledged me and the second time just after she picked up the phone .

name: James Gilmore
text: I was sent to pick up item for my company (Mullinax Ford). Staff very friendly

name: Kenneth Thornton
text: Good customer service.

name: Benjamin Ford
text: The people in Wesco are some of the friendliest and most knowledge that I have had the pleasure to deal with. I can call them with issues and if they cannot help me they point me in the correct direction, even if it has been a competitor. I do not even shop around anymore because their level of service far exceeds anything experienced today. It is a pleasure going in and just talking with them. Highly recommend them for all of your welding needs.

name: Scott Yant
text: Friendly , knowledgeable people with good products & prices.

name: Boone Myers
text: Hands down the best welding supply store I’ve ever dealt with. Very quick service and the employees are very helpful and knowledgeable. I’ll be going back for any welding supply needs.

name: Clint Grantham
text: Honesty goes a long way.  Some of the most honest men I've done business with in a while.    I look forward to doing business with your in the future.

name: Christopher Senn
text: I'm a student at Wallace college. I went inside wesco to purchase a file card. The new help they have hired asked if I needed help finding anything but didn't even know what I was looking for. He then followed me around as if I were going to steal something. He was very unprofessional. Lost my business permanently!

resp.text: Fortunately, the experience you had at WESCO is far from typical.  We do apologize for the misunderstanding and would welcome the opportunity to show the community WESCO has to offer.  We appreciated any feedback that will give us the opportunity to continue being a good partner in the community.

name: s vanhoveln
text: Friendly, easy to work with, and much better prices for gas than competitors.

name: James McCord
text: I could not ask for better service.

name: corbin king
text: Great place to shop with great employees.

name: Gorman Cassidy
text: Really helpful with product information and recommendations on different types of gases and uses, affordable and has nice equipment and accessories!

name: Kathleen Faulkner
text: Helped me get a 20lb c02 tank quickly!!

name: Samuel Tullis
text: Very Professional Staff

name: Timtimtimtim Timtimtim
text: GAS

name: james pendley
text: We're very friendly and helpful and everything I needed. Unlike the other welding store in the area that told me they just soon me find somewhere else to do business.

name: Alan Goodman
text: Half price for same stuff as big businesses, this is only place to shop for welding supply!

name: J316
text: Great place to buy refill C02 bottles for home brewing.

name: Jeremy Mize
text: A1 service

name: Nathan Jenkins
text: Nate and all of the employees down at Wesco Gas and Welding Supply in Foley Alabama are some of the friendliest most helpful guys in town. Whether you're a professional spending thousands of dollars on the best equipment money can buy for your livelihood or just a hobbyist like myself. Proudly sticking metal together, making bad welds and thinking to yourself the whole time that you're going to be the next Wayne Gretzky of welding when in turn you're actually the Helen Keller of welding but that's neither here nor there. The guys at Wesco will do their best to help us Gretzky's do the best we can do in order to achieve a welding hobby on a budget. Personally I will not buy any of my welding products anywhere else due to the fact when I walk out of there I know and understand what I spent the money on and have the confidence knowing that it's going to do the right job for me. Sure I could probably get it a little bit cheaper right down the street but I'm going to get an inferior product sold to me by a person who probably knows more about cooking burgers from across the street at Burger King than selling what welding and gas supplies.

name: Roy “R” C
text: Great place,  friendly people and amazing service attitude!

name: James Eiland
text: Great service.

name: James C Gibson
text: Great service , had more on the shelf than I expected , great place to do buisness

name: James Lick
text: They were  very informative, it seams to be a one stop shop

name: James Scott
text: Nate was very helpful and a pleasure to work with, thank you.
